response.overview: A dangerous international spy is determined to give up his high stakes life to finally build a closer relationship with his estranged wife and daughter. But first, he must complete one last mission - even if it means juggling the two toughest assignments yet: hunting down the world's most ruthless terrorist and looking after his teenage daughter for the first time in ten years, while his wife is out of town.
response.tagline: The question is... kill or die?
response.title: 3 Days to Kill

cast.name: Laure Gouget
cast.character: Mother of Kid on the Bus
